Segment.name: CSU
Segment.comment: To provide supplemental information on a course or a particular instance of a course

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier1
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod1
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier2
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod2
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: InstructionalSettingCode
Field.comment: Code indicating type of instructional setting where an education program is provided

Field.name: AcademicCreditTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of credit used (awarded) by the institution

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)
